channel.title: Batteries – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Blackcell 18650 Proton Battery – 2PK
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.content:encoded:
The Blackcell 18650 Proton Battery has a long storage life, is lightweight and has high energy density! This battery can also be used with high-drain devices that are compatible with 18650 batteries. The rechargeable battery is designed and performs with a powerful charge. Blackcell batteries are Li-CoMnNi and made with optimal rolled steel and materials. The Electron offers a dual functional pressure relieve valve making sure you stay safe. Blackcell go through a strict process and quality system while being tested by the TUV Rheinland.

Battery Details:

  • Brand: Blackcell
  • Model: Proton
  • Size: 18650
  • Nominal Capacity: 3018mAh
  • Nominal Voltage: 3.7V
  • Maximum Voltage: 4.2V
  • Discharge Current: 40.2A Maximum Pulse / 20.3A Maximum Continuous
  • Style: Flat Top

Package Contents:

  • 1x Blackcell 18650 Proton Battery – 2PK

Usage Specifications:

  • Fully charge before initial use
  • Always charge battery in/on a fireproof surface
  • Never leave charging batteries unattended.
  • To avoid short circuits, keep this battery away from metal objects (e.g. coins, keys, jewelry)
  • Keep the battery in its case or any other insulated material
  • To avoid shortening your battery’s life, do not overcharge it– doing so may result in the battery popping or leaking
  • Do not use the battery is there are signs of previous usage
  • Do not dispose battery with the use of fire
  • Stacking more than one battery at a time may result in explosion.
  • Never short the battery. Connect the positive and negative sizes.
  • Use special caution when working with Li-ion (Lithium-ion), LiPo (Lithium-ion Polymer) and any rechargeable cells.

Warning-
1). Do not disassemble, dispose in fire, heat or short circuit
2). Do not insert batteries with the (+) and (-) reversed.
3). Do not mix fresh batteries with used batteries.
4). Do not submerge the battery in water.

item.title: iJoy20700 (40amp, 3000mAh)
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Great for mid-high wattage, single cell devices
item.content:encoded:
The latest iJoy 20700 3000mAh 40A 3.7V Battery is a highly rated rechargeable battery from a renowned manufacturer, perfect to use in VV/VW Devices and other high power configurations. It features 3000mAh capacity and constructed with flat top design.

iJoy 20700 40A 3000mAh Battery Features:

  • Nominal Capacity: 3000mAh
  • Maximum Discharge Current: 40A
  • Continuous Discharge Current: 20A
  • Nominal Voltage: 3.7V
  • Top: Flat Top
  • Type: NCR
  • Size: 20700

Great for mid-high wattage, single cell devices

Please note:
1. Fully charge before initial use
2. Always charge battery in/on a fireproof surface
3. Never leave charging batteries unattended.
4. To avoid short circuits, keep this battery away from metal objects (e.g. coins, keys, jewellery)
5. Keep the battery in its case or any other insulated material
6. To avoid shortening your battery’s life, do not overcharge it doing so may result in the battery popping or leaking
7. Do not use the battery is there are signs of damage to skin
8. Do not dispose battery with the use of fire
9. Stacking more than one battery at a time may result in explosion.
10. Never short the battery. Connect the positive and negative sizes.
11. Use special caution when working with Li-ion (Lithium-ion), LiPo (Lithium-ion Polymer) and any rechargeable cells.

Warning
1). Do not disassemble, dispose in fire, heat or short circuit
2). Do not insert batteries with the (+) and (-) reversed.
3). Do not mix fresh batteries with used batteries.
4). Do not submerge the battery in water.

item.title: iJoy 26650 (40amp, 4200mAh)
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Very efficient for high wattage, single or dual cell devices
item.content:encoded:
iJOY INR 26650 3.7V 4200mah 40A High-Drain Battery (SINGLE)
– Size: 26650
– Type: Li-Ni (High Drain)
– Typical Capacity: 4200mAh
– Min Capacity: 4200mAh
– Nominal Voltage: 3.7V
– Peak Voltage: 4.2V
– Cut-off Voltage: 2.5V
– Dimensions: 26.22mm (Diameter) x 65.11mm (Length)
– Rechargeable: Yes
– Max Continuous Discharging Current: 40A
– Max Pulse Discharging Current: 85A
– Style: Flat Top
– Color: Black and Gold
– Rated Capacity: 4200mAhTemperature range: -20 to +60 Degree CelsiusMonthly Self-discharge rate: Less or equal 0.5%
Temperature range: Discharge: -20 to +60 Degree Celsius, Charge: 0 to 45 Degree Celsius

Very efficient for high wattage, single or dual cell devices

Please note:
1. Fully charge before initial use
2. Always charge battery in/on a fireproof surface
3. Never leave charging batteries unattended.
4. To avoid short circuits, keep this battery away from metal objects (e.g. coins, keys, jewellery)
5. Keep the battery in its case or any other insulated material
6. To avoid shortening your battery’s life, do not overcharge it doing so may result in the battery popping or leaking
7. Do not use the battery is there are signs of damage to skin
8. Do not dispose battery with the use of fire
9. Stacking more than one battery at a time may result in explosion.
10. Never short the battery. Connect the positive and negative sizes.
11. Use special caution when working with Li-ion (Lithium-ion), LiPo (Lithium-ion Polymer) and any rechargeable cells.

Warning
1). Do not disassemble, dispose in fire, heat or short circuit
2). Do not insert batteries with the (+) and (-) reversed.
3). Do not mix fresh batteries with used batteries.
4). Do not submerge the battery in water.

item.title: Golisi 20700 (40amp, 3200 mAh)
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Great for mid-high wattage, single cell devices
item.content:encoded:
Inheriting Golisi 21700 most advantages, this high drain 20700 cell S32  performances large capacity and excellent discharging rate.  S32 is covered with PLI (Product Liability Insurance) by PICC

S32 Capacity: 3200mAh / 30A CDR, Max 40A/ 3.7V

Safety protection: Based on UL1642 standard, no leaking or explosion in extreme tests of over–charging, short circuit, over discharging, high temperature

Certificates: CE, ROHS, FCC, MSDS, UN38.3, IEC62133, WEEE

Great for mid-high wattage, single cell devices

NOTE: PRICE IS FOR 1xBATTERY

Please note:
1. Fully charge before initial use
2. Always charge battery in/on a fireproof surface
3. Never leave charging batteries unattended.
4. To avoid short circuits, keep this battery away from metal objects (e.g. coins, keys, jewellery)
5. Keep the battery in its case or any other insulated material
6. To avoid shortening your battery’s life, do not overcharge it doing so may result in the battery popping or leaking
7. Do not use the battery is there are signs of damage to skin
8. Do not dispose battery with the use of fire
9. Stacking more than one battery at a time may result in explosion.
10. Never short the battery. Connect the positive and negative sizes.
11. Use special caution when working with Li-ion (Lithium-ion), LiPo (Lithium-ion Polymer) and any rechargeable cells.

Warning
1). Do not disassemble, dispose in fire, heat or short circuit
2). Do not insert batteries with the (+) and (-) reversed.
3). Do not mix fresh batteries with used batteries.
4). Do not submerge the battery in water.

item.title: 50amp, 3000mAh
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Very efficient long lasting for low wattage devices & more power and longer life for high wattage devices
item.content:encoded:
The AWT 18650 high-drain 50A battery is perfect for mechanical mods and sub-ohm builds.
The lithium-ion battery has a capacity of 3000mAh and is manufactured by AWT.

Features & Specs:
Dimensions: 65.05mm (L) x 18.2mm (D)
Weight: 54g
Nominal Capacity: 3000mAh
Nominal Voltage: 3.7V
Continuous Discharge Current: 50A
Discharge Voltage: 2.5V

Please note:
1. Fully charge before initial use
2. Always charge battery in/on a fireproof surface
3. Never leave charging batteries unattended.
4. To avoid short circuits, keep this battery away from metal objects (e.g. coins, keys, jewellery)
5. Keep the battery in its case or any other insulated material
6. To avoid shortening your battery’s life, do not overcharge it doing so may result in the battery popping or leaking
7. Do not use the battery is there are signs of damage to skin
8. Do not dispose battery with the use of fire
9. Stacking more than one battery at a time may result in explosion.
10. Never short the battery. Connect the positive and negative sizes.
11. Use special caution when working with Li-ion (Lithium-ion), LiPo (Lithium-ion Polymer) and any rechargeable cells.

Warning
1). Do not disassemble, dispose in fire, heat or short circuit
2). Do not insert batteries with the (+) and (-) reversed.
3). Do not mix fresh batteries with used batteries.
4). Do not submerge the battery in water.

Please note: Price is per 1 x battery
